code:
%%{Health_Sync}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [Health_Sync] --> IDLE
    IDLE --> FETCH: Kick-off
    FETCH --> PARSE: Complete
    PARSE --> ARB_READ: Valid
    PARSE --> ERROR: Invalid
    ARB_READ --> READ: Grant
    READ --> ARB_WRITE: Complete
    ARB_WRITE --> WRITE: Grant
    WRITE --> CHAIN: Complete
    CHAIN --> FETCH: Next
    CHAIN --> COMPLETE: Last
    COMPLETE --> IDLE: IRQ sent
    ERROR --> IDLE: SW clear
